## Dataset Setup
```{r}
data <- read.csv("./data/ODI_Match_info.csv")
glimpse(data)
# Convert 'season' to character type if it's not already
data$season <- as.character(data$season)
data$date <- as.Date(data$date)

# Loop through each year from 2002 to 2023
for (year in 2002:2023) {
  # Modify 'season' based on the condition (start dates in the next year and '/' symbol in 'season')
  data <- data %>% 
    mutate(season = ifelse(substr(date, 1, 4) == as.character(year + 1) & str_detect(season, "/"), 
                           paste0(substr(season, 1, 4), "/00"), 
                           season))
}

# View the updated data
head(data)

# View the updated data
data$season

head(data)



```
